main_menu.title: 📋 Main Menu
main_menu.desc: Use the buttons below to navigate through the available features:
help.text: ℹ️ How to Use Your Solmate: 1️⃣ Use "💳 Generate Wallets" to create wallets. 2️⃣ Use "📜 My Wallets" to manage wallets. 3️⃣ Use "🪙 Mint Tokens" to mint new tokens. 4️⃣ Use "💰 Refund" to process refunds. ⚠️ Safety Reminders: 🔒 Keep your private keys private. 💾 Save your .txt file securely. 🗑️ Delete the .txt file from the chat history for security.
